summary: Frontend testing of AI Model Selection features in CapCut-style Video Editor. All core AI UI features work correctly - Feature Tiles open modals, Model Selector dropdown shows all providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini), KI-Funktionen Panel has all 4 tabs working. Minor issue: Settings gear button in sidebar not connected to SettingsPanel.

integration_issues.issue: Gear button in LeftSidebar (aria-label='Einstellungen') is not connected to open SettingsPanel.jsx modal

passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly with all 5 Feature Tiles visible
KI-Model tile (data-testid='tile-ki-model') opens AI Settings Modal
AI Settings Modal shows all 3 providers: OpenAI (8 models), Anthropic (5 models), Google Gemini (6 models)
Model Selector button and dropdown work correctly with 19 model options
Automatisch ausschneiden tile opens KI-Funktionen Panel
KI-Funktionen Panel shows all 4 tabs: Drehbuch, Titel, Übersetzen, Ideen
Tab switching works correctly in KI-Funktionen Panel
Drehbuch tab: Shows Thema input, Länge dropdown, Stil dropdown, Claude 4 Sonnet model
Titel tab: Shows Platform options (Youtube, Tiktok, Instagram, Andere), Video-Thema input, GPT-5 Mini model
Übersetzen tab: Shows Von/Nach language dropdowns (Deutsch/Englisch), Text input, GPT-5.2 model
Ideen tab: Shows Kategorie options (Tutorial, Vlog, Review, etc.), Nische input, GPT-5.2 model
Qualität optimieren tile opens KI-Funktionen Panel
All Feature Tiles have correct data-testid attributes
action_items: OPTIONAL: Connect gear button in LeftSidebar to open SettingsPanel modal (low priority - AI settings accessible via KI-Model tile)
critical_code_review_comments: AI API calls use Emergent LLM Key (sk-emergent-...) - will fail without valid key but UI works correctly
AutoCaptionPanel.jsx exists but is designed for Editor view, not Dashboard - this is correct architecture
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing

success_rate.frontend: 95% - All core AI features work, minor settings access issue

context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Model Selection UI is fully functional. Feature Tiles on Dashboard open correct modals. KI-Funktionen Panel has 4 working tabs (Drehbuch, Titel, Übersetzen, Ideen). Model Selector dropdown shows all 3 providers with 19 total models. The only minor issue is the gear button in sidebar not opening SettingsPanel, but AI settings are accessible via KI-Model tile. AutoCaptionPanel is for Editor view, not Dashboard.
